mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking_date (bookingDate, isDay, isNight, idVenue,bookingOn,namaPernikahan,namaPenanggungJawab1,handPhone1,namaPenanggungJawab2,handPhone2 ,userEmailBooking) values ( #{dateTimeMilisecond}, #{isDay}, #{isNight}, #{idVenue}, #{dateTime}, #{namaPernikahan}, #{namaPenanggungJawab1}, #{handPhone1}, #{namaPenanggungJawab2}, #{handPhone2}, #{userEmailBooking} )
mapper.select: select b.namaPernikahan as namaPernikahan ,b.namaPenanggungJawab1 as namaPenanggungJawab1, b.handPhone1 as handPhone1, b.namaPenanggungJawab2 as namaPenanggungJawab2, b.handPhone2 as handPhone2, v.titleVenue as titleVenue from booking_date b inner join venue v on b.idVenue = v.id where b.userEmailBooking = #{emailUserLogin}
